title: "login music off" disables all music.
body: "login music off" disables all music. The other buttons and settings do not matter for the sound.

replies.body: Hey Bliep, thanks for calling this out - we're working on a fix right meow.
Don't know if the fix is already deployed, but this persists. I just installed the alpha and was trying things when i noticed that this still isn't fixed
